Hill Community.quietHours: 10:00 PM – 8:00 AM Sunday–Thursday; 2:00 AM – 10:00 AM Friday–Saturday
Hill Community.courtesyHours: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
Hill Community.laundry: Hill Hall basement — free for residents with UGA ID
Hill Community.mailroom: Hill Community Front Desk in Hill Hall
Hill Community.parking: No on-site parking. Nearest lot: Hull Street Deck

policies.guests: Guests must be escorted at all times. Overnight guests allowed max 3 consecutive nights with roommate approval. No more than 2 guests per resident at a time.
policies.alcohol: Residents 21+ may have alcohol only in their own room. No alcohol in common areas, hallways, or bathrooms. No kegs, beer pong tables, or bulk containers.
policies.smoking: UGA is a tobacco-free campus. No smoking, vaping, or tobacco use anywhere on campus grounds.
policies.pets: Only fish in tanks 10 gallons or smaller. No dogs, cats, hamsters, reptiles, etc. Service animals are permitted with Disability Resource Center approval.
policies.decorations: No candles, incense, halogen lamps, or open flames. No nails in walls — use removable adhesive strips. Nothing may hang from sprinklers or cover smoke detectors.
policies.appliances: Microwaves and mini-fridges allowed (max 4.5 cubic feet fridge). No hot plates, toasters, toaster ovens, George Foreman grills, or open-coil appliances.
policies.noise: Keep music and conversations at a reasonable level during courtesy hours (24/7). Quiet hours are strictly enforced — first violation is a warning, repeated violations may result in conduct referral.
policies.lockouts: First 3 lockouts free at the front desk. After that, $25 charge per lockout. Carry your BuzzCard at all times.
policies.maintenance: Submit maintenance requests through the UGA Housing portal at housing.uga.edu or call the front desk for emergencies.

generalPolicies.firesafety: Fire drills happen each semester. Evacuate immediately when the alarm sounds. Do not use elevators. Meet at your community's designated assembly point. Tampering with fire equipment (extinguishers, alarms, sprinklers) is a federal offense and results in immediate removal from housing.
generalPolicies.moveInOut: Move-in dates are set by UGA Housing each semester. Check housing.uga.edu for your assigned date and time. Move-out requires a checkout with your RA — all personal belongings must be removed and room must be clean. Improper checkout may result in charges.
generalPolicies.roomChanges: Room change requests open after the first 2 weeks of the semester. Submit requests through the UGA Housing portal. Room swaps within the same community are easier to approve.
generalPolicies.internetWifi: UGA provides free WiFi campus-wide through PAWS-Secure network. Connect using your UGA MyID and password. Ethernet ports are available in most rooms.
generalPolicies.recycling: Blue bins = recyclable (paper, cardboard, plastic #1-#2, cans, glass). Green bins = compostable (food scraps, napkins). Black bins = landfill (everything else). Bins are located on each floor and outside each building.
